items.title: Gemini
items.description: Get help with writing, planning, learning, and more from Google AI.

writer.name: Article & Content Writer Tools
writer.description: Looking for better way to write your content or articles? Check out these tools!

items.title: AI Writer
items.description: Get your writing done faster and easier with AI Writer.
items.header: What topic would you like to write about?
items.placeholder: Enter your title or topic here
items.payload: Write an article based on this -

items.title: AI Writing Assistant
items.description: Increase The Quality of Your Writing
items.header: Ask anything or give any writing job
items.placeholder: Ask anything or give any writing job here
items.example: Write an article about digital marketing

items.title: AI Writing Assistant
items.description: AI-Generated Content that is realistic, and accurate.
items.header: What is your content Title or Topic?
items.payload: Write an article based on this -

items.title: AI Paragraph Generator
items.description: Make writing paragraphs easier with our generator!
items.header: What is your paragraph Title or Topic?
items.payload: Make some paragraph in this topic: -

items.title: AI Paragraph Expander
items.placeholder: Type or paste your text here

items.title: AI Text Generator
items.description: Create unlimited AI text with our easy-to-use generator.
items.payload: Make some paragraph in this topic -

items.title: Blog Outline Generator
items.description: Make your blog outline in a snap!
items.header: What do you want to write about?
items.payload: Write 10 outline in this topic for article:

items.title: Blog Intro Generator
items.description: Make your blog introduction stand out with our easy to use generator tools.
items.header: What do you want to write about?
items.placeholder: Enter your Title or Topic here
items.payload: Write Introduction in this topic for article:

items.title: AI Copy-Writer
items.description: The future of copywriting is here.
items.header: What do you want to write about?
items.payload: Write an article on this topic :

items.title: AI Meta Description
items.description: Make your site's meta descriptions more effective with our AI generator.
items.header: What do you want to write about?
items.payload: Write a meta description (under 150 - 160 chr) in this topic:

items.title: AI Blog Writer
items.header: What topic would you like to write about?
items.placeholder: Enter your title or topic here
items.payload: Write an article based on this -

items.title: Topic Sentence Generator
items.description: Take Your Creativity To The Next Level
items.header: What do you want to write sentence about?
items.placeholder: Please enter your topic along with any specific points or keywords...
items.payload: Write sentence based on this topic or prompts:

items.title: AI Paper Writer
items.description: Write smarter, not harder, with the power of AI paper writer tools at your fingertips.
items.header: What do you want to write about?
items.placeholder: Please provide me with a clear and specific topic, as well as any additional instructions or requirements you may have.
items.example: The impact of social media on mental health in teenagers
items.payload: Write a paper on this topic :

items.title: AI FAQ Generator
items.description: Get all your questions & answered in one place!
items.header: What do you want to write FAQs about?
items.payload: Write some FAQs with questions and answers on this topic :

items.title: Introduction Paragraph
items.description: Transform Ideas into Engaging Introductions with AI!
items.placeholder: Enter a brief topic, a few keywords, or a short paragraph to provide context for your introduction.
items.payload: Write a Introduction Paragraph based on this: -

items.title: AI Image Generator
items.description: Your Imagination, Brought to Life by AI.
items.header: Write a prompt for generating an image
items.example: A photo of an astronaut riding a horse on Mars.
